# uptimekuma_notification_opsgenie (Resource)

OpsGenie notification resource

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "uptimekuma_notification_opsgenie" "example" {
  name      = "OpsGenie Example"
  is_active = true
  api_key   = "your-opsgenie-api-key"
  region    = "us"
  priority  = 2
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `api_key` (String, Sensitive) OpsGenie API key
- `name` (String) Notification name
- `region` (String) OpsGenie region (e.g., 'us', 'eu')

### Optional

- `apply_existing` (Boolean)
- `is_active` (Boolean)
- `is_default` (Boolean)
- `priority` (Number) Alert priority level (1-5)

### Read-Only

- `id` (Number) Notification identifier
